relevant_findings.general: Patient appeared alert but in moderate distress, edentulous with dry mucosa.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Diffuse tenderness, no guarding, no rebound tenderness, normal bowel sounds.
relevant_findings.rectal: Normal sphincter tone, gross blood present.
relevant_findings.legs: Warm, but diminished pulses in the right leg compared to the left.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Diminished pulses in the right leg were noted, indicating a potential development of arterial insufficiency.

relevant_findings.blood_count: Hemoglobin level dropped to 7.6 g/dL, platelet count dropped to 55,000 per cubic mm.
relevant_findings.legs: Worsening pain and cooler right foot compared to left.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Diminished pulses in the right leg worsened and right foot became cooler than the left, indicating progression of arterial insufficiency.
